entry.title: WEATHER ADVISORY , Haliburton
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:15 AM EST Monday 26 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: -6.0°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Bancroft 11:00 AM EST Monday 26 December 2022
Temperature: -6.0°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.6 kPa rising
Humidity: 77 %
Wind Chill: -10
Dewpoint: -9.3°C
Wind: SSW 9 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High minus 6. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries early this afternoon. Flurries beginning this afternoon. Local amount 2 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 6. Wind chill near minus 10. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Monday 26 December 2022

entry.title: Monday night: Flurries. Low minus 12.
entry.summary: Flurries. Risk of snow squalls overnight. Local amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 12. Wind chill minus 10 this evening and minus 15 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Monday 26 December 2022

entry.title: Tuesday: Flurries. High minus 5.
entry.summary: Flurries ending in the afternoon then cloudy. Local amount 2 cm. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h in the afternoon. High minus 5. Wind chill minus 15 in the morning and minus 7 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Monday 26 December 2022
